summary:
I don't think Skyrim has lots of mages followers, so i decided to add a new one, his name is Ignis and just like you are dragonborn, he is a Phoenixborn.
He is a powerful fire mage that can be found at bannered mare in whiterun.
This is my 1st mod ever, i hope you like and if you find a problem please tell me.
Maybe i will be
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT, this mod needs ApachiiSkyHairMale_v_1_2 because of the hairstyle, well you can use the others too but this hairstyle is only in the 1.2 version.
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?
Also if you want him to look like the pictures you will need Fine Face texture (not required)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?
And Better Males - younger faces merged with men (not required)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?
If you wanna that armor it is part of TERA Armor collection (not required)
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25846/?
Thanks for those amazing mods.

Now Added a Second version of Ignis, you will find the version in the download page. In the second version Ignis should level up with the player and i added the Spell Flames to that version, otherwise he would always attack with melee, when he is out of mana he will attack with his bare hands or with a weapon if you give him one.
If he doesn't level up with the player open the command menu with the button Â² of your keyboard, select him and use the command Setlevel 1000 1 0 (level you want without the ()).

Backstory

Ignis was part of a powerful wizard Guild named Sacred Fire that existed in High Rock, they were very close like family, always helping each other and fighting evil together.
But once the Thalmor came with a army following the orders given by Elenwen with only one goal: Destroy The Sacred Fire, Because the Thalmor were afraid that one day that guild would attack them and make justice.
After kill everyone in the guild and setting it on fire, the Thalmor went back to Skyrim.
The morning after the attack, Ignis came back from his mission and found the guild destroyed.
Crying in despair of losing everyone he cared about, Ignis shouted, that's when he discovered that he was a Phoenixborn. After that Ignis found a note dropped by the Thalmor captain with the orders and their symbol, and then he swore revenge on the Thalmor and went to Skyrim to get it.

Name: Ignis
Race: Breton
Gender: Male
Age: 25
Class: Mage
Level 80 (you can change it with console commands if you want)
Spells: Fireball, Incinerate, Fire Storm, Flame cloak, Fire Breath Shout
Location: Bannered mare in Whiterun
Marriageable: Yes
author: Hirochu
